attributes.action: ensure no British money goes towards educating Palestinians for continued violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many reports that Palestinian educational schoolbooks and public television are educating children for hate and continued violence instead of promoting a peaceful coexistence with Israel.

Please ensure no British money go towards funding such 'education'.

rejection.details: Please confirm that you are a British citizen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
